notice_cn.title: 注意！
notice_cn.main: 请务必只充入OMNI链的USDT资产

adds.text: 只支持OMNI链的USDT充值，充入其他资产将不可找回
使用USDT地址充值需要2个网络确认才能到账
Send only USDT based on OMNI to this deposit address. Sending any other coin or token to this address may result in the loss of your deposit
Coins will be deposited immediately after 2 network confirmations
